CustomField.formula: if(OR(RecordType.Name = $Label.IP_Replacement_Rec_Type, RecordType.Name = $Label.IP_Relocation_I4W_Rec_Type),'Not Applicable', if(RecordType.Name <> 'New Install', SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(if(AND(INCLUDES( FS_Outlet__r.FS_Active_SAP_Jet_Indicators__c , "JT"), INCLUDES(Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c,'9000'), CONTAINS(FS_Outlet__r.FS_JetIndicator_ActionNeeded_PIA__c,'Remove JT1')),'Remove JT; ','')+ if(AND(INCLUDES( FS_Outlet__r.FS_Active_SAP_Jet_Indicators__c , "JT Crew"), INCLUDES(Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c,'8000'), CONTAINS(FS_Outlet__r.FS_JetIndicator_ActionNeeded_PIA__c,'Remove JT Crew')),'Remove JT Crew; ','')+ if(AND(INCLUDES( FS_Outlet__r.FS_Active_SAP_Jet_Indicators__c , "MV"), INCLUDES(Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c,'7000'), CONTAINS(FS_Outlet__r.FS_JetIndicator_ActionNeeded_PIA__c,'Remove MV')),'Remove MV; ','')+ if(AND(INCLUDES( FS_Outlet__r.FS_Active_SAP_Jet_Indicators__c , "JJ"), INCLUDES(Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c,'9100'), CONTAINS(FS_Outlet__r.FS_JetIndicator_ActionNeeded_PIA__c,'Remove JJ')),'Remove JJ; ','')+ if(AND(INCLUDES( FS_Outlet__r.FS_Active_SAP_Jet_Indicators__c , "JM"), INCLUDES(Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c,'6000'), CONTAINS(FS_Outlet__r.FS_JetIndicator_ActionNeeded_PIA__c,'Remove JM')),'Remove JM; ','')+ if(AND(INCLUDES( FS_Outlet__r.FS_Active_SAP_Jet_Indicators__c , "MT"), INCLUDES(Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c,'7100'), CONTAINS(FS_Outlet__r.FS_JetIndicator_ActionNeeded_PIA__c,'Remove MT')),'Remove MT; ','')+ if(AND(INCLUDES( FS_Outlet__r.FS_Active_SAP_Jet_Indicators__c , "JET6"), INCLUDES(Type_of_Dispenser_Platform__c,'6050'), CONTAINS(FS_Outlet__r.FS_JetIndicator_ActionNeeded_PIA__c,'Remove JET6')),'Remove JET6; ','')+".","; .", null),".",null), if(Overall_Status2__c='Complete',FS_Jet_Indicator_Action_Needed_IP__c,FS_Outlet__r.FS_Jet_Indicator_Action_Needed__c)))
